author: dreiss
msg: Tweak Java Makefile.ams to fix "make distclean".
The Java Makefile.ams assume the existence of ANT, but "make distclean"
runs in the Java directories even if ENABLE_JAVA is off.  This change
makes the clean-local target handle the absence of ANT, fixing

author: dreiss
msg: Check for ptrdiff_t and fail if we don't have it.

author: dreiss
msg: C++/TFramedTransport: Don't write an empty frame on flush.
